Battleship

How To Play:

  • Battleship is a strategy guessing game.
  • Each player takes turns to destroy the other's battleships.
  • There are two phases: placing ships and attacking.
  • In the placing ships phase:
    • Drag ships to place them on your board.
    • Alternatively, click the "Randomize" button to place them randomly.
    • Click on a ship to toggle between horizontal and vertical placement.
  • Each player has 10 ships of different lengths.
  • The first player to correctly guess and destroy all opponent's ships wins the game.
